sentences.en: ...a new era of democracy after a long period of military dictatorship in the country.
sentences.cn: …该国长期军事独裁统治结束后到来的民主新纪元。

sentences.en: And classes still remain and will remain in the era of the dictatorship of the proletariat.
sentences.cn: 并且阶级会依然存在,会在无产阶级专政时期存在.

sentences.en: Anybody who dared to oppose the new dictatorship was cast out of his own country.
sentences.cn: 任何敢于反对新专政的人都被驱逐出国.

sentences.en: Does this man look like he's ceding czechoslovakia to a fascist dictatorship?
sentences.cn: 这男人的样子像是会把捷克割让给法西斯的人 吗 ?

sentences.en: It is the dictatorship of factionalism.
Our army is the mainstay of the dictatorship of the proletariat in China.
sentences.cn: 我们的军队是无产阶级专政的柱石.

sentences.en: Proletarian dictatorship, have deny and affirm double function.
sentences.cn: 无产阶级专政, 具有否定和肯定双重功能.

sentences.en: Schlamm denounces dialectics and the class struggle, not to mention the dictatorship of the proletariat.
sentences.cn: 施拉姆不承认辩证法、阶级斗争, 更不用说无产阶级专政了.

sentences.en: Second, Marxism, mainly the thought of its class struggle and proletarian dictatorship theory.
sentences.cn: 二是马克思主义唯物史观, 主要是其阶级斗争的思想和无产阶级专政理论.

sentences.en: The dictatorship will become unnecessary when classes disappear dictatorship of the proletariat they will not disappear.
sentences.cn: 当阶级消亡之后,无产阶级专政就变的不必要了.

sentences.en: The people cannot exercise dictatorship over themselves, nor must one section of the people oppress another.
sentences.cn: 人民自己不能向自己专政, 不能由一部分人民去压迫另一部分人民.

sentences.en: The theory of the dictatorship of the proletariat is the quintessence of Marxism.
sentences.cn: 无产阶级专政的理论是马克思主义的精髓.

sentences.en: There are better ways to control crime than by offering dictatorship.
sentences.cn: 至于控制犯罪,有许多比专政更好的办法.
这个专政是干什么的 呢 ?

sentences.en: When liberty becomes license dictatorship is near.
sentences.cn: 当自由变成了放纵,专政就不会远了.

sentences.en: Who is to exercise this dictatorship?

words.tran_cn: 独裁的，专政的；专横傲慢的

trans.tran_cn: 独裁，专政，独裁权，执政者的职位（任期）
trans.tran_en: government by a ruler who has complete power
